name: Gmail Agent
description: An agent that helps users manage and query their Gmail account. Supports searching, drafting, sending emails, retrieving messages and threads.

skills.name: Create Email Content
skills.description: Generate formatted email content with a signature for review before sending or drafting.
examples: Create email content to invite my friend to a party.
Generate an email to thank my professor for the recommendation.

skills.name: Create Email Draft
skills.description: Create a draft email in the user's Gmail account.
examples: Draft an email to John about the meeting.
Create a draft for my travel request.

skills.name: Send Email
skills.description: Send an email from the user's Gmail account.
examples: Send an email to Alice with the project update.
Email my manager the weekly report.

skills.name: Search Emails
skills.description: Search for emails in the user's Gmail account based on keywords, sender, or date.
examples: Search for emails about my flight booking.

skills.name: Get Email Message
skills.description: Retrieve the content of a specific email message.
examples: Show me the latest email from HR.
Get the details of the email about my invoice.

skills.name: Get Email Thread
examples: Show the conversation with Bob about the project.
Get the thread for my travel approval.
